imdb.title: Hakuouki
imdb.plot: When her father has disappeared, Chizuru Yukimura goes searching for him in Kyoto. She is attacked by strange men, and then rescued by the Shinsengumi.

episodes.title: Dawn of the Divine Warriors
episodes.plot: Bleeding and left to die, Ryunosuke Ibuki is rescued and taken in by the Roshigumi - a band of warriors struggling to find a sponsor and make a name for themselves in Kyoto. Unfortunately, Ryunosuke can't easily pay off a life debt..

episodes.title: Led by Destiny
episodes.plot: A mysterious skilled warrior joins the Roshigumi. Meanwhile, Ryunosuke is unable to even draw his sword. He learns more about the Roshigumi, including shocking information regarding his own benefactor, Commander Kamo Serizawa.

episodes.title: Rules for a Pack of Wolves
episodes.plot: Spreading renown is no easy task with an unruly commander. The other Roshigumi commanders attempt to curb Serizawa with a strict set of rules, but he is not moved. Meanwhile, his bloodthirsty attributes rub off on a certain young warrior.

episodes.title: The Blade Drenched in Blood
episodes.plot: After Vice Commander Hijikata rebukes Souji Okita for his aggressiveness, Ryunosuke learns about the young warrior's past. Meanwhile, Serizawa provokes Souji into satisfying his desire for blood.

episodes.title: Stairway to the Blue Skies
episodes.plot: Ryunosuke stumbles into Kosuzu, a geisha apprentice he saved earlier. In order to further their attempts to obtain a sponsor, the Roshigumi organize duels to impress the lord of Aizu. Ryunosuke is asked if he wishes to learn how to fight.

episodes.title: Howling from the Darkness
episodes.plot: A doctor of western medicine comes to stay with the Roshigumi and performs shocking experiments with deadly results. New recruits join, but the Roshigumi now have secrets they must protect.

episodes.title: Oath Made on the Wind Blowing Over the Grass
episodes.plot: The feuds with Serizawa continue; Commander Kondou and Vice Commander Hijikata reminisce about their past and contemplate their goals. Meanwhile, the experiments on the strange Water of Life proceed.

episodes.title: The Shackles of Pandemonium
episodes.plot: Hajime Saito recalls his early days at the dojo. He offers to teach Ryunosuke sword fighting. Meanwhile, the Roshigumi's reputation fails due to misinterpretations and debts.

episodes.title: The Light of a Flashing Sword
episodes.plot: Ryunosuke's past and future is discussed. The dog must watch his master, and Ryunosuke has to keep an eye on Serizawa's behavior. Meanwhile, another out-of-control experiment shakes Kyoto.

episodes.title: The Brightly Burning Beacon
episodes.plot: Commander Serizawa has no bonds. The research on the Water of Life advances. And the Mibu Roshigumi receive the chance of a lifetime to make a name for themselves.

episodes.title: A Moonlit Night Filled with Flowers
episodes.plot: Koudou Yukimura disappears after a fire, and Nimi soon joins him along with all of the research on the Water of Life. The Roshigumi put forth all their efforts in attempt to find him.

episodes.title: The Great Dawn
episodes.plot: The anticipation of murder and mutiny rises until the storm breaks. And Ryunosuke's true loyalty is put to the test.

episodes.title: Memories in Kyoto
episodes.plot: Chizuru looks back at her past experiences - from when she first joined the Shinsengumi, to the present.

episodes.title: Homura no gotoku
episodes.plot: The Shinsengumi suffer heavy losses, but keep moving forward and working hard. Hijikata, despite Chizuru's protests, is no exception. However, now being a fury, the Vice Commander must also fight the monster within.

episodes.title: Satetsu no kairou
episodes.plot: The Shinsengumi are on the brink of battle but morale and odds of success are low. Before leaving to get reinforcements, Hijikata recruits Chizuru as Kondou's bodyguard. Still and all, in the heat of battle, an unexpected relative appears.

episodes.title: Tooki omokage
episodes.plot: While Sanosuke, Shinpachi, and Shiranui face an army of upgraded furies, Chizuru confronts a long-lost sibling and discovers the horrifying truth about her family. Still more tears her apart when two close friends leave the Shinsengumi.

episodes.title: Seishin wa towa ni
episodes.plot: After learning that the furies' possess a fatal flaw, those who drank the Water of Life are urged to restrain from using their powers. The Imperial army surrounds the Shinsengumi base and Commander Kondou makes a critical decision.

episodes.title: Tamayura no yume
episodes.plot: The Shinsengumi team up with the Bakafu army and lay siege to Utunomiya Castle. Yet unbeknownst to them, a certain familiar enemy lurks within.

episodes.title: Kagayakeru gyoukou
episodes.plot: Chizuru and the injured Hijikata head to Aizu to regroup with the Shinsengumi. In the meantime, Sanosuke and Shiranui lay in wait to attack Koudou's starved fury army and Souji overhears a plot to kill Hijikata.

episodes.title: Tendou no yaiba
episodes.plot: Hajime Saito, leading the Shinsengumi in place of Hijikata, joins with the captain Masaki and his Aizu soldiers. However, the two do not get along very well. The Imperial army advances, yet the lord of Aizu is stubborn.

episodes.title: Chizuru ouka
episodes.plot: After the Shinsengumi lose contact with Sannan and the Fury Corps, they receive strange reports from the Sendai domain. Chizuru is kidnapped and taken there where she learns the truth.

episodes.title: Yukiwarisou no hanasakite
episodes.plot: The war thickens. Amid meager victories and devastating defeats, Chizuru is determined to return to and remain at Hijikata's side. However, Kazama reveals to Chizuru his resolution to finish things with the former vice commander.

episodes.title: Mugen no haku sakura
episodes.plot: After battling against the Imperial army, Hijikata and the Bakafu receive dismaying news. The end is near, but Chizuru and Hijikata will not be separated. Nevertheless, during an attack on Bentin fortress, Chizuru's worst fears come true.

episodes.title: Sekka no miyako
episodes.plot: Chizuru Yukimura is in Kyota looking for her father, a doctor who's gone missing. When demons called ronin chase her, she is saved by the Shinsengumi. They allow her to live at their headquarters since they are also looking for her father.

episodes.title: Douran no hibuta
episodes.plot: Chizuru becomes more familiar with the inner workings of the Shinsengumi society. Following a lead concerning the whereabouts of her father, she ends up running into the Shinsengumi's enemy. This encounter leads to uncovering a plot against Kyoto and the Emperor.

episodes.title: Yoiyami ni saku hana
episodes.plot: A small Shinsengumi squad apprehends the Chousuu conspirators at Ikedaya.

episodes.title: Yami yori kuru mono
episodes.plot: A mysterious stranger arrives and announces an upcoming storm. Many confrontations arise as they race to Mt. Tennozan.

episodes.title: Soukoku seshi yaiba
episodes.plot: The Shinsengumi plan to move to a larger headquarters. Meanwhile, Sanaan continues research on that medicine in a dangerous way.

episodes.title: Oni no meimyaku
episodes.plot: It is unclear if Sanaan will recover from his horrible reaction to the medicine. While on patrol, Chizuru and the soldiers rescue a girl who looks exactly like Chizuru. The Oni strangers attempt to kidnap Chizuru.

episodes.title: Shikkoku no unmei
episodes.plot: Chizuru discovers a damning secret about Okita.

episodes.title: Asaki yume mishi
episodes.plot: Chizuru finally dresses as a girl on a celebratory night out.

episodes.title: Shura no wadachi
episodes.plot: After the incident of an uncovered Shinsengumi, Kashitarou Itou announces his leave. However, he's not going alone. Meanwhile, the devils fabricate a plan to kidnap Chizuru.

episodes.title: Kizuna no yukue
episodes.plot: The Shinsengumi try to thwart the plan to assisnate Commander Kondou.

episodes.title: Kobore ochirumono
episodes.plot: After an attempted assassination, Commander Kondou is in critical condition. Kaoru reveals the reason he hates Chizuru.

episodes.title: Kengeki no kanata
episodes.plot: The Shinsengumi battle it out with the imperial forces in their final conflict.
